KnowledgeBaseUrl.title: Knowledge Base Url
KnowledgeBaseUrl.description: If configured, a menu item "Knowledge base" will show up where the user can browse the page from the UI.

MenuShowIdentity.title: Show Identity Menu Item
MenuShowIdentity.description: Configures whether to show the Identity menu item. Defaults to true

MenuShowApps.title: Show Apps Menu Item
MenuShowApps.description: Configures whether to show the Apps menu item. Defaults to true

MenuShowSelfService.title: Show Self Service Menu Item
MenuShowSelfService.description: Configures whether to show the Self Service menu item. Defaults to true

MenuShowCompanyPortal.title: Show Company Portal Menu Item
MenuShowCompanyPortal.description: Configures whether to show the Company Portal menu item. Defaults to true

MenuShowKnowledgeBase.title: Show Knowledge Base Menu Item
MenuShowKnowledgeBase.description: Configures whether to show the Knowledge Base menu item. Defaults to true

BrandName.title: Brand Name
BrandName.description: Configures the name shown in the navigation menu.

AccentColor.title: Accent Color
AccentColor.description: Configures the brand color shown in the app, specify in hex format.

BrandLogo.title: Brand Logo
BrandLogo.description: Configures the brand logo shown in the apps side menu. Specify a Base64 string.

BrandLogoLight.title: Brand Logo Light
BrandLogoLight.description: Configures the brand logo shown in the apps side menu when light theme is used. Specify a base64 string

SupportPageUrl.title: Support Page URL
SupportPageUrl.description: Configures the URL to open when the user clicks on the Get Support button.

ChangePasswordUrl.title: Change Password URL
ChangePasswordUrl.description: Configures the URL to open when the user clicks on the Change Password button.

ChangePasswordMode.title: Change Password Mode
ChangePasswordMode.description: Configures the mode for the Change Password button, available modes are: local, SSOExtension, url. Defaults to local if not configured.

SupportEmail.title: Support Email
SupportEmail.description: Configures the email address shown when the user clicks on the Support Info button.

SupportPhone.title: Support Phone
SupportPhone.description: Configures the phone number shown when the user clicks on the Support Info button.

HiddenCards.title: Hidden Cards
HiddenCards.description: Configures which cards to hide, available cards are: DeviceInformation, Evergreen, Battery, Actions, ApplicationInstallProgress, Storage, DeviceManagement, PendingAppUpdates.

HiddenActions.title: Hidden Actions
HiddenActions.description: Configures which actions to hide, available actions are: ChangePassword, Reboot, OpenManagementApp, GetSupport, GatherLogs, SoftwareUpdates, RestartIntuneAgent.

NotificationInterval.title: Notification Interval
NotificationInterval.description: Configures the interval for notifications in hours for Application Updates and Software Updates notifications.

NotificationTitle.title: Notification Title
NotificationTitle.description: Configures the title for notifications for notifications. Defaults to Support Companion if not configured.

NotificationImage.title: Notification Image
NotificationImage.description: Configures an image to add to notifications. Local path should be specified.

SoftwareUpdateNotificationMessage.title: Software Update Notification Message
SoftwareUpdateNotificationMessage.default: Software Updates Available. Please update your device to the latest version.
SoftwareUpdateNotificationMessage.description: Configures the message for notifications for Software Updates notifications. Defaults to "Software Updates Available. Please update your device to the latest version." if not configured.

SoftwareUpdateNotificationButtonText.title: Software Update Notification Button Text
SoftwareUpdateNotificationButtonText.description: Configures the button text for notifications for Software Updates notifications. Defaults to "Update Now ðŸš€" if not configured.

AppUpdateNotificationMessage.title: App Update Notification Message
AppUpdateNotificationMessage.default: App Updates Available. Please update your apps to the latest version.
AppUpdateNotificationMessage.description: Configures the message for notifications for App Updates notifications. Defaults to "App Updates Available. Please update your apps to the latest version." if not configured.

AppUpdateNotificationButtonText.title: App Update Notification Button Text
AppUpdateNotificationButtonText.description: Configures the button text for notifications for App Updates notifications. Defaults to "Update Now ðŸš€" if not configured.

Mode.title: Mode
Mode.description: Configures the app to show application info for either Munki, Intune or to use System profiler for app info. The app tries to dynamically detect which mode to use.

LogFolders.title: Log Folders
LogFolders.description: Configures the log folders to gather logs from. Only used when gathering logs. Defaults to "/Library/Logs/Microsoft" if not configured.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the action to show in the menu.

Command.title: Command
Command.description: Command to run when to item is clicked.

Icon.title: Icon
Icon.description: SF Symbol to show in the Self Service page in the UI.

IsPrivileged.title: Is Privileged
IsPrivileged.description: SF Symbol to show in the Self Service page in the UI.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Description to show in the Self Service page in the UI.

Actions.title: Actions
Actions.description: Configures custom actions to add to the tray menu. See example below.

DesktopInfoWindowPosition.title: Desktop Position
DesktopInfoWindowPosition.description: Configures the position of the desktop info. Defaults to Lower Right.

DesktopInfoLevel.title: Desktop Info Level
DesktopInfoLevel.description: Configures the level of information to show on the desktop. Defaults to 4.

DesktopInfoHideItems.title: Desktop Info Hide Items
DesktopInfoHideItems.description: Use this array to determine which information to hide. Available items are: HostName, Model, SerialNumber, Processor, IPAddress, Memory, OSBuild, OSVersion, LastRestart, FileVault, StorageName, SupportPhone, SupportEmail. It is also possible to hide entire sections: Hardware Specifications, System Information, Network Information, Storage, Support.

DesktopInfoBackgroundOpacity.title: Desktop Info Background Opacity
DesktopInfoBackgroundOpacity.description: Configures the opacity of the desktop info. Defaults to 0%.

DesktopInfoFontSize.title: Desktop Info Font Size
DesktopInfoFontSize.description: Configures the font size for the desktop info. Defaults to 14.

CustomCardPath.title: Custom Card Path
CustomCardPath.description: Configures a path to a JSON file containing custom widgets to show on the Home view.
